net.corda.core.node

Interface AppServiceHub

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServiceHub, ServicesForResolution

    public AppServiceHub
extends ServiceHub

    A interface CordaService annotated class requires a constructor taking a single parameter of type interface AppServiceHub. With the interface AppServiceHub parameter a interface CordaService is able to access to privileged operations. In particular such a interface CordaService can initiate and track flows marked with interface StartableByService.

    See Also:
    interface CordaService, interface AppServiceHub, interface AppServiceHub, interface CordaService, interface CordaService, interface StartableByService

      Start the given flow with the given arguments, returning an Observable with a single observation of the result of running the flow. flow must be annotated with interface StartableByService. TODO it is assumed here that the flow object has an appropriate classloader.

      • startTrackedFlow

        <T> FlowProgressHandle<T> startTrackedFlow(FlowLogic<? extends T> flow)

        See Also:
        Observable, interface StartableByService

      • getDatabase

        CordaTransactionSupport getDatabase()

        Accessor to interface CordaTransactionSupport in order to perform sensitive actions within new, independent top level transaction.

        There are times when a user thread may want to perform certain actions within a new top level DB transaction. This will be an independent transaction from those used in the framework.

        See Also:
        interface CordaTransactionSupport

      • register

        void register(int priority,
              ServiceLifecycleObserver observer)

        Allows to register interface ServiceLifecycleObserver such that it will start receiving enum ServiceLifecycleEvents

        Parameters:
        priority - controls to which queue observer will be added. Higher values correspond to higher priorities.
        observer - an instance of interface ServiceLifecycleObserver to be registered.
        See Also:
        interface ServiceLifecycleObserver, enum ServiceLifecycleEvent

      • register

        <T> void register(int priority,
                  Function1<? super net.corda.core.node.services.ServiceLifecycleEvent,? extends T> func)

        Convenience method to be able to add an arbitrary function as a AppServiceHub.register callback.

        See Also:
        AppServiceHub.register
